gramaticas.producciones:
AL ->  id := P
P ->  P  or D | D
D -> D and C | C
C -> S  | not ( P )
S -> ( P ) | OP REL  OP | true | false  
REL ->    = | < | <= | > | >= | <>
OP -> id | num

E -> lit | ide
E -> opad E
E -> E opad E
E -> E asig E
E -> E int E dpt E
E -> ap E cp

S -> c A
A-> a B
B -> b | λ

S -> A B | s
A -> a S c | e B f | λ
L -> b A d | λ

S -> A B
A -> a
A -> λ
B -> b C d
C -> c
C -> λ
